Title: Relates to owner liability for failure of an operator to comply with stop signs in the village of Round Lake, county of Saratoga
Summary: Authorizes the village of Round Lake, county of Saratoga to establish a demonstration program imposing monetary liability on the owner of a vehicle for failure of an operator thereof to stop for a stop sign in such village.
LawCode: Add ยง1172-a, V & T L; amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public officers law, in relation to owner liability for failure of an operator to comply with stop signs in the village of Round Lake, county of Saratoga; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
